form.div: Please select and configure the fields for your offering.

group.name: fields_for_offering
group.string: Select the fields for your offering

group.name: filters
group.string: Select the filters for your Offering

div.p: Do you want to link the sample request to an existing lead?
If you choose to link an existing lead, its stage will automatically change to 'Sample Request'.

Please select an expiration date. The default expiration period is 21 days from the sample’s creation. After 21 days, the sample will be automatically released. You will be notified 5 days before the expiration, and if you need to extend the due date, please contact the administrator.
